title: Senior Frontend Developer
description: Lead the frontend development team in building responsive web applications using React and Next.js. Implemented CI/CD pipelines and improved performance by 40%.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Developed and maintained full-stack applications using the MERN stack. Collaborated with designers to implement UI/UX improvements and integrated third-party APIs.

title: Junior Web Developer

title: Freelance Developer
